con:testCase.name: GoodCases-DEV-Pain008-CAMT054-Account=InActive
con:testCase.con:description:
This test-case tests scenario from followed us: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2903 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2904 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2905
DRC-2903: Test scenario to implement: create account for direct debit recharge balance for account direct debit with pain008 customer cancels mandate -> set account to inactive (deregisterforPaymentMethod) clawback with camt054 (debit) -> clawback processing successful try to activate account -->Must be possible. try to register account with the same msisdn again --> Must be not possible. deregister account with deregisterForDirectDebit
According to PPIT (Robert Festl) after deregisterForPaymentMethod only the following two scenarios are possible: RegisterforDirectDebit for the account where the payment methid was deregistered -> activate account again DeregisterForDirectDebit
DRC-2904: Followed test scenario must be implemented: Register one new account. Set account to inactive Charge customer account in state inactive Clearing: derigister account. Expected result: Recharge is rejected (to be clarified: Expected error
DRC-2905: Followed test scenario must be implemented: Register one new account for DD. Set account to inactive Process Camt054-credit with credit for account Expected result: -> Credit is processed successfully

con:request.name: chargeCustomer-OnDemand-Error=1105
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
